review: My main purpose is to be able to use my phone and tablet as a remote while watching Youtube and netflix. It is very painful to type using the regular remote of my BluRay player for searching.What it cannot do, and I wish it did:cast from other browsers (on my PC),cast the desktop from PC (i.e. be able to watch move from VLC player et al)Amazon's Kindle Fire does not have an app for Chromecast (as of Nov 2014)None of this was surprise, as I had read other reviews and Googled.
